short_summary: Supply of one JBF 26/40 Flash IT Media Shredder
description: The RCMP has a requirement for the Supply of one JBF  26/40 Flash IT Media Shredder to 73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa Ontario, K1A 0R2 by June 1, 2024.
full_summary:
**ACAN IT Media Destruction Machine**
Publication Date: April 10, 2024

**Synopsis:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has issued a Tender Notice to supply IT Media Shredder equipment. The agency requires one JBF 26/40 Flash IT Media Shredder for the RCMP's 73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R2 facility.

**Contract Information:**
- **Contract Identification:**
  - Number: WS4480505794
  - Reference Number: 4531100223
  - Amendment Number: 0
- **Publication Details:**
  - Publication Date: April 10, 2024
  - Tender Closure Date: April 29, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
- **Contract Award Criteria:**
  - The contract will be awarded based on the **Lowest Price**

**Media Destruction Requirement:**
The RCMP requires a JBF 26/40 Flash IT Media Shredder for their facility in Ottawa, Ontario, with the expected installation and commisioning date being June 1, 2024.

**Trade Agreements:**
This notice respects the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**.

**Regions of Delivery:**
- National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contact Information:**
For any information or inquiry regarding this tender notice, please contact:

- Louie Turner
- Phone: Not available
- Email: [louie.turner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:louie.turner@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19366395?extsite=MTkzNjYzOTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that any necessary form for bidding is to be accessed on the aforementioned Ariba URL or by doing an advanced search. Prequalification is mandatory and the deadline to do so is shown on Ariba too.

The rewrastered transport should now be free of all modifications that make no sense and adhere to current English usage.
